name: On the Case with Paula Zahn
original_name: On the Case with Paula Zahn
overview: Award winning journalist Paula Zahn unravels shocking crimes interviewing those closest to the case including lawyers, the victim's family, detectives and the convicted murderer themselves.

episodes.name: Deadly Lessons
episodes.overview: A seventeen year-old student is missing and a charismatic young teacher may be involved. The investigation leads to a shocking discovery.

episodes.name: A Murder in Pleasant Valley
episodes.overview: After a mother is gunned down in a church parking lot, police uncover a tangled web of adultery, deception and corruption that ultimately led to her murder.

episodes.name: Honeymoon Hit
episodes.overview: When a beautiful young woman is murdered in her own home, police use high tech equipment and old fashioned police work to bring an unlikely killer to justice.

episodes.name: Hit or Miss
episodes.overview: An investigation into a deadly case of mistaken identity reveals a secret love triangle and an underworld web of intrigue.

episodes.name: Date with Death
episodes.overview: A woman meets a younger man at a night spot and survives his brutal attack. It triggers a series of investigations and leads to the discovery that a serial killer might be on the loose.

episodes.name: A Death in the Desert
episodes.overview: Legendary Las Vegas casino owner Ted Binion dies under mysterious circumstances. Was it murder or just an accidental drug overdose?

episodes.name: Love You to Death
episodes.overview: A husband catches his wife having an affair with a mysterious lover, but just after she ends the affair she winds up dead and police must figure out if it is a tragic accident or murder.

episodes.name: The Millionaire Murder
episodes.overview: A media mogul calls 911 and says he's been gravely wounded, but has no idea what happened. Police investigate and discover he's been shot. The investigation leads to a shocking motive and sensational trial.

episodes.name: Last Stop Murder
episodes.overview: A beautiful and talented woman's charred remains are found in a parking lot. Police race against the clock to discover the killer's identity before he gets away with murder. A minute by minute account of the investigation.

episodes.name: Out of the Ashes
episodes.overview: A man is convicted of a murder he says he did not commit. Can he prove he was framed from behind bars?

episodes.name: A Murder at Echo Lake
episodes.overview: A successful lawyer calls 911 reporting that both he and his wife have been shot after being forced off the highway by an unknown assailant. Police investigate and unravel a shocking mystery.

episodes.name: Newlywed Murders
episodes.overview: Two men are convicted of murdering a newlywed couple. One faces the death penalty. Did they really do it or were they victims of small town corruption?

episodes.name: The Boy Next Door
episodes.overview: A teenage girl is murdered in her backyard, but the he case goes cold. After more than 30 years police make an arrest, but do they have the right man?

episodes.name: Beauty and the Beast
episodes.overview: In 2004, a Brigham Young University student, Brooke Wilberger, mysteriously vanished from a parking lot in Corvallis, OR and the case made national headlines.

episodes.name: Murder in the Heartland
episodes.overview: Bobie and Marilyn Blewer sold funnel cakes from their stagecoach wagon for decades at the Iowa State Fair, held in Des Moines every August. When the couple is found murdered on the fairgrounds, it becomes the first homicide ever in the 150-year history of the Iowa State Fair. Police unravel a shocking plot that leads to back to the unlikeliest killers.

episodes.name: Twin Killing?
episodes.overview: When a prestigious and popular Huntsville Alabama doctor is found murdered in his own home, the investigation points to a local handyman who says the doctor's wife and her twin sister are the masterminds behind the murder.

episodes.name: A Lamb Amongst Wolves
episodes.overview: College student Mark Fisher went out in Manhattan with friends one night and ended up shot to death outside a house party in Bensonhurst, Brooklyn. The puzzle of what happened to Fisher left investigators at a loss when fellow partiers put up a wall of silence.

episodes.name: The Long Road Home
episodes.overview: The murder of 19-year-old Mischelle Lawless sent shock waves through Benton, MO. As the investigation unfolded, police zeroed in on 17-year-old Josh Kezer who has gang ties. Was he the one who pulled the trigger?

episodes.name: A Killing in Canova Beach
episodes.overview: After an alleged jailhouse confession, questionable canine scene evidence and sexual misconduct between the star witness and lead investigator, William Dillon was convicted of  murdering James Dvorak in Canova Beach, FL, in 1981 and sentenced to life without Parole. But is any of it true? Did investigators convict the wrong man?

episodes.name: She Never Came Home
episodes.overview: A college student goes missing from the parking lot of Montgomery College in Texas. Her parents organized teams to search for her. Will they find her alive, or will the mysterious man she was last seen with be found responsible for her disappearance?

episodes.name: Deadly Delivery
episodes.overview: Betty Mottinger, a postmaster in Elgin, Ohio, is abducted in broad daylight. When her body is discovered 6 weeks later it sets off a cat and mouse game between a career criminal and a postal inspector that may lead to the identity of Betty’s killer.

episodes.name: Web of Lies
episodes.overview: Police find a 22-year-old man shot to death in a deserted parking lot. Investigators uncover a possible motive for the murder. It appeared the victim, his middle-aged co-worker and a teenaged girl were involved in an internet love triangle.

episodes.name: Daddy's Girl
episodes.overview: When a wealthy, beautiful young girl is found burnt alive in a dilapidated basement her friends and family are devastated. But out of the ashes, her loving and grief stricken father embarks on a relentless, exhausting search for the truth.

episodes.name: Beyond Redemption
episodes.overview: We enter the mind of a cruel and sadistic predator whose acts of wanton violence - and subsequent arrest - are the beginning of a twisted tale of one man's madness and one woman's quest for the truth.

episodes.name: Twisted Triangle
episodes.overview: A bitter divorce pits a husband-and-wife team of FBI agents against each other and casts one into the arms of a world-famous crime novelist. What unfolds is a shocking, twisted tale stranger than any fiction.

episodes.name: Aim to Kill
episodes.overview: Danny Paquette is gunned down on the first day of hunting season. Is it a tragic accident or does someone want him dead? A story of dark family secrets and a twenty year search for the truth in a small New Hampshire town.

episodes.name: Beauty Queen Killer
episodes.overview: A man is shot in his living room while his family is upstairs. Guns are scattered all over the lawn, and there's no assailant in sight, but then police get a huge break when they set up an on-camera sting that ultimately leads to a conviction.

episodes.name: Gallaudet Murders
episodes.overview: In September 2000, Eric Plunkett - a popular student known for his smile - was mysteriously murdered in his dorm room at Gallaudet University, plunging the campus into a state of shock and terror. Could police stop his killer from striking again?

episodes.name: Voices in the Dark
episodes.overview: When a beautiful college freshman is viciously assaulted in her dorm room, police quickly zero in on a suspect… but when he points the finger at someone else, the search for the truth threatens to tear a small town apart.

episodes.name: Murder She Wrote
episodes.overview: When a man is found shot to death in his bedroom, police suspect the author of a threatening series of emails the victim had received. The trail leads them to a jilted lover but will it be enough to prove murder?

episodes.name: A Cry in the Night
episodes.overview: A blossoming love is cut short when a young woman is found brutally murdered in her boyfriend’s home. The puzzling crime leads investigators to multiple suspects and reveals a tragic tale of senseless violence.

episodes.name: Cheating Death
episodes.overview: A woman asks her husband for a divorce but he has a very different plan for how to end their marriage… Which will prove stronger her will to survive or his desire to see her dead?

episodes.name: Internal Affairs
episodes.overview: After the wife of a local policeman is gunned down in broad daylight, investigators uncover a murderous plot stemming from a torrid affair; and fear one of their own may be involved.

episodes.name: Run Bambi Run
episodes.overview: A sultry waitress gets fingered for brutally murdering her husband’s ex-wife. After her brazen prison escape turns the convicted killer into a national celebrity, questions about the case against her come to light.

episodes.name: Sins of the Father
episodes.overview: A mysterious call about a decades-old murder baffles police. As they dig deeper they uncover the monster behind the crime and a son’s terrible secret.

episodes.name: Blood Betrayal
episodes.overview: A beautiful young mother is savagely murdered in her own home. As police investigate, they discover a dangerous web of intrigue connected to an all American family.

episodes.name: Shadow of Doubt
episodes.overview: A mother of three is found brutality murdered in a downtown bar. A former Air Force sergeant is charged with the crime, but his family's crusade for justice leads to a surprising conclusion.

episodes.name: Evil Twin
episodes.overview: When several young girls go missing, the investigation leads to a desperate hunt for a possible serial killer. Is the only hope at cracking the case the suspect's twin brother?

episodes.name: Dark Side of a Dream
episodes.overview: When a young girl goes missing under mysterious circumstances, police must determine if her dreams of fame and Hollywood stardom lead her to tragedy...

episodes.name: Silenced
episodes.overview: In the summer of 1996, 22-year-old Carrie Culberson was last seen driving away from her house. The timing of her disappearance was suspicious as she was about to testify in court against her abusive boyfriend, Vincent Doan. Did she simply run away from a troubled relationship or was her disappearance something far more sinister?

episodes.name: Message in Blood
episodes.overview: After a frantic 911 call in a Tampa suburb, investigators arrive to find a shaken Timothy Permenter outside the home of his girlfriend, Karen Pannell. The former model had been stabbed multiple times and police discovered the letters "ROC" written in blood on the wall next to her body. Would the victim's dying act point them to her killer?

episodes.name: Race to Judgment
episodes.overview: After a September home game in the tiny town of Tatum, TX, 18-year-old David Reid jumped into his truck and drove off into the night. Meanwhile, 4 cheerleaders heading out for a post-game party pulled onto Highway 149 and suddenly, the vehicles crashed into each other. David was the only survivor, but was he to blame?

episodes.name: A Tangled Past
episodes.overview: Margaret Bradley had Multiple Sclerosis and was living with her daughter, Rhonda, a nurse. A part-time aide  helped Margaret while Rhonda was at work. In 2002, Margaret suddenly fell ill and died the next evening of unusual and dangerously low blood sugar levels. Rhonda, who knew her mother didn't have diabetes, looks into her mother's untimely end and wonders if her mother's death was really murder. Her search for answers would eventually lead authorities to open a criminal investigation.

episodes.name: Campus Killer
episodes.overview: When a young girl goes missing from her university campus, her mother is forced to lead an investigation for the truth. Can she find her precious daughter before it’s too late?

episodes.name: Murder by the Numbers?
episodes.overview: A small town is outraged when its unofficial mayor is the victim of a attack at work. The police investigation uncovers a number of possible suspects and a confusing trail of evidence but will it lead them to the person who committed the crime?

episodes.name: Under Suspicion
episodes.overview: When a 26-year-old wife and mother vanishes investigators wonder if she simply just ran away or if it was something far more sinister. The search for answers would take nearly a decade and lead her family on a journey they could never have imagined.

episodes.name: A Mother's Nightmare
episodes.overview: A young boy is murdered in his bed in the middle of the night. Police suspect the child’s mother. Over the next nine years there will be accusations, a confession and a conviction but will justice be served?

episodes.name: A Murder at Loose Chippings
episodes.overview: After a wealthy couple is found dead in their stately Virginia home investigators are taken on a wild journey around the globe before they uncover the shocking truth.

episodes.name: Betrayal at Charisma Farms
episodes.overview: When a man is found murdered on the side of the road investigators must unravel a tangled web of intrigue that will test the strength of a family's love.

episodes.name: Mystery in the Mountains
episodes.overview: After a young woman disappears from her mountain home, it looks like the case will never be solved. Then, a retired FBI profiler joins the cold case team and jump starts a 13-year-old investigation.

episodes.name: A Slip of Fate
episodes.overview: A woman is found clinging to the guardrail of a steep embankment. She tells police a harrowing story; two men had attacked her and her husband at gunpoint and now he is missing. Was it a robbery gone wrong or part of a far more sinister plot?

episodes.name: Murder Ordained?
episodes.overview: When a young minister’s wife is found dead, it appears to be a tragic accident. But then, another member of the congregation is murdered. Police begin to wonder if its just a coincidence or a calculated plot.

episodes.name: In Broad Daylight
episodes.overview: In a small town outside Atlanta, young mother Heather Strube is gunned down in a Target parking lot in broad daylight while stunned eyewitnesses search for cover, and with her 18-month-old son just a few feet away. Police have little to go on beyond a bizarre description of the brazen killer and the surveillance video of him walking away from the crime scene. After a painstaking and difficult investigation, they come up with an incredible and surprising suspect.

episodes.name: Death and the Doctor
episodes.overview: Margo Prade, a prominent doctor in Akron, OH, is discovered shot and killed in her van parked outside her office. Margo was one of their own, married for 17 years to a highly respected captain in the Akron Police Department. Investigators quickly discover a videotape that documents the murder, but the most important clue is a bizarre bite mark left behind by the killer.

episodes.name: Severed Ties
episodes.overview: Cathy and Lyndel Robertson were both shot multiple times while asleep in their bedroom. Cathy died at the scene, but somehow, Lyndel survived, despite being shot in the face and chest. A mysterious fingerprint on a box of ammunition could be the key to unlocking the mystery behind the brutal crime.

episodes.name: No One to Trust
episodes.overview: 18-year-old Lisa Kimmell was driving home for the Easter holiday when she vanished somewhere on the 600 miles of desolate highway between Denver, CO, and Billings, MT. Days later, her body is found, murdered. The case spans 14 years and dozens of suspects are examined, including the man in charge of the investigation, before reaching its shocking conclusion.

episodes.name: A Stranger's Knock
episodes.overview: Norma Ates' body was discovered when firefighters responded to a fire at her house; she was shot and killed in her own bedroom. After years of searching, police finally find two mysterious strangers who were seen outside the house just before the crime took place; their story will help solve the mystery and convict the most unlikely of suspects.

episodes.name: Twice Is No Accident
episodes.overview: When Fran Smith mysteriously disappears her sister and daughter mount their own investigation... What they uncover sends police on a cross country man hunt for a killer.

episodes.name: Lost in the Fire
episodes.overview: When a pregnant mother of two is found shot to death in her fire-ravaged home, police find there are more suspects than clues.

episodes.name: Last Rites
episodes.overview: When a nun is found strangled and stabbed to death on the day before Easter, investigators are forced to look behind church walls in search of a killer.

episodes.name: Secrets from the Grave
episodes.overview: After a teenager's partially nude body is discovered brutally beaten in a desolate cemetery, Investigators and her family face an emotional journey to the truth behind her murder.

episodes.name: Murder at Sunset
episodes.overview: A mother and two daughters are discovered floating in Tampa Bay after a brutal triple homicide. Police must rely on a victim who survived a similar attack to bring the killer to justice.

episodes.name: Left in the Dark
episodes.overview: When a beautiful young graduate student is found stabbed to death, detectives must determine if the murder was a crime of passion or a brutal attack by a violent intruder.

episodes.name: The Art of Murder
episodes.overview: In order to solve the murder of a talented young art student, investigators must first unravel a bizarre web of jealousy and deceit.

episodes.name: Unmasking a Killer
episodes.overview: A beautiful grad student is found murdered inside a yoga apparel store. On the surface it appeared she was the victim of a botched robbery, but remarkable police work revealed a far more sinister plot.

episodes.name: Mystery in the Desert
episodes.overview: When an innocent couple is murdered execution-style in the Arizona desert, it marks the beginning of a 50-year search for the truth. After decades of investigation, the controversial case remains shrouded in mystery including a claim that an innocent man was framed by his ex-wife for both murders.

episodes.name: Innocent Witness
episodes.overview: Young mother Rhonda Boggs is stabbed to death in her kitchen and the only witness is her 2-year-old daughter. What the child witnessed aids the cops to catch the killer's trail.

episodes.name: Dirty Secrets
episodes.overview: 17-year-old Joanna Rogers disappeared from her home in the middle of the night in Lubbock, TX, and her body is later found dumped in a landfill. The investigation is aided by evidence from another brutal murder case. Police painstakingly track leads, including of all things, a barcode tag on luggage found in a landfill.

episodes.name: Over the Edge
episodes.overview: Police are called to the scene of a tragic car wreck in the Blue Ridge Mountains. But as investigators examine the crash site they realize Wendy Kratzert's death was no accident. As they follow a startling trail of betrayal back to their prime suspect, they uncover another mysterious disappearance.

episodes.name: Hanging by a Thread
episodes.overview: Hillsborough County in Florida is in the midst of a horrifying crime spree with young women turning up dead every week. Teenager Lisa McVey's bravery helps to bring an end to a vicious killer's reign of terror.

episodes.name: The River's Edge
episodes.overview: When 17-year-old high school student Stacy Fairchild disappears from a mall parking lot in Lancaster, OH, on her way home from work, the police suspect kidnapping or murder and zero in on her suspicious soldier boyfriend, but they may be pursuing the wrong man. Later, another young woman escaped an attack inside a tanning salon and helped police link DNA from her attacker to the Fairchild mystery.

episodes.name: A Deadly Betrayal
episodes.overview: A beloved father of two is killed execution-style after a friendly game of poker turns deadly. It's up to the police to find out the real truth behind the the crime.

episodes.name: No Exit
episodes.overview: A couple is gunned down in a savage attack while in Washington, D.C., and the killer leaves almost no clues. When another similar murder is discovered, the mystery starts to unravel and police are led to an evil beyond imagination.

episodes.name: Fatal Footage
episodes.overview: An innocent mother of two is mysteriously gunned down on her way to work in downtown Philadelphia. Despite the fact that surveillance cameras recorded every detail, including the killer's getaway, but the footage does not reveal his identity.

episodes.name: Vanished in the Night
episodes.overview: A 20-year-old woman goes missing after a night out with friends, and police are baffled. The disappearance remains unsolved for a decade, until a cold case investigator and an undercover sting operation uncovers dark secrets that blow the case wide open.

episodes.name: Taken
episodes.overview: In the span of 8 months, 3 young girls are kidnapped from their homes in Virginia and murdered. As police hunt for the killer, he strikes again, and a young girl's heroic actions crack the case.

guest_stars.character: Self - True Crime Author, "Into the Water"
guest_stars.name: Diane Fanning

episodes.name: Murder at Bird Key
episodes.overview: A successful businessman is found brutally murdered in his palatial home in Sarasota, Florida. Stabbed four times, it appears he is the victim of a robbery gone wrong, and a mysterious backpack found at the crime scene is the key to the case.

episodes.name: A Tale Tell Call
episodes.overview: When Jackie Casseteri fails to show up for work, her friends and family know something is terribly wrong. Her sister rushed to her apartment and stumbled upon Jackie's lifeless body lying on the floor in a pool of blood. Investigators were unable to determine the cause of death and believed that the key to solving the mystery were calls made to a telephone dating service, from Jackie's cell phone... after her death.

episodes.name: Painful Memories
episodes.overview: Young marine Kevin Green comes back home from a fast food run and finds his 9-month-pregnant wife savagely beaten in their bedroom. Was he an innocent victim, or could he have been responsible for the terrible crime?

episodes.name: Profile of a Killer
episodes.overview: When beautiful 22-year-old Karla Brown's boyfriend returned home from work, he discovered her lifeless battered body hanging out of a barrel of water in the basement of her brand-new home. After years of trying to solve the puzzling murder, investigators decide to launch a bold and risky plan to bring an unlikely killer to justice.

episodes.name: Final Words
episodes.overview: As Pauline Card returned home from work to have dinner with her 17-year-old daughter Shauna, she found her daughter lying dead on the floor of the bathroom; Shauna had been stabbed more than 70 times. The mention of a mysterious boyfriend in the pages of Shauna's diary may point to the person responsible for murdering her.

episodes.name: A Knock on the Door
episodes.overview: A beautiful young mother is found murdered in the bedroom of her home. The only witness was her five year old son. Would he be able to help police solve the crime?

episodes.name: Snapshot to Murder
episodes.overview: A high school student vanishes into thin air during a day studying in the park. Will a photograph from a nearby celebration help solve the case?

episodes.name: A Deadly Secret
episodes.overview: A small town hair dresser is found beaten and strangled in her beauty salon. After the investigation goes cold, an act of conscience cracks the case.

episodes.name: Murder at Sunrise
episodes.overview: A beautiful young mother is found murdered while walking her dogs. Investigators suspect her killer is someone she knew. Twenty-six years latter police make an arrest but is he the right man?

episodes.name: The Day After Christmas
episodes.overview: A man and his girlfriend are attacked by a mysterious intruder in their home. Despite near fatal wounds, she survives and helps investigators solve the crime.

episodes.name: One Month of Terror
episodes.overview: After abducting a 17-year-old girl in front of her home her kidnapper taunts the family with phone calls and disturbing letters. But a tiny mistake will eventually lead police to his door.

episodes.name: Driven to Kill
episodes.overview: A new father comes home to find his infant son and wife missing. Four months later their bodies are found in a remote wooded area. When police investigate the father’s past they find the reason for the unthinkable crime.

episodes.name: A Long Journey to Justice
episodes.overview: When a young college student is found murdered on the side of road, it is the start of a tormenting 26 year journey to justice for her family.

episodes.name: The Ultimate Sin
episodes.overview: A man’s crisis of conscience unravels a decades old mystery behind a young girl’s murder.

episodes.name: Signed in Blood
episodes.overview: In order to solve the vicious double murder of a beloved couple, police must uncover a cold blooded killer’s carefully calculated plot

episodes.name: Tangled Web
episodes.overview: A wife discovers her husband's body lying in a pool of blood in front of his truck on Valentine's night. While she pointed investigators toward a prime suspect, they uncovered a love triangle that stood between them and the truth.

episodes.name: Bound by the Truth
episodes.overview: When a retired professor is found murdered, police must figure out whether the victim’s son and daughter in law were eyewitnesses or the killers.

episodes.name: Smoke and Ashes
episodes.overview: A beautiful bride-to-be is murdered when a bomb explodes as she enters her home and investigators must piece together shards of glass to solve the case.

episodes.name: Veil of Suspicion
episodes.overview: Lee Sehorne, a beloved husband and father is found executed in front of his home. Police officers strive to determine if a dark secret is the reason for the execution-style shooting.

episodes.name: At Death's Door
episodes.overview: After a single mother is viciously attacked and left for dead, she still manages to help police track down her assailant.

episodes.name: Hidden in Plain Sight
episodes.overview: A 9-year-old girl disappears while delivering cookies to a neighbor, and Paula takes a look at the mystery that took Nashville on a 30 year journey to the truth.

episodes.name: The Killer Rang Twice
episodes.overview: After the investigation into the death of beautiful real estate agent goes cold; detectives wonder if another shocking crime can be the spark that reignites her case?

episodes.name: Justice Never Quits
episodes.overview: A 54-year-old mother is shot in the head and stabbed. Solving this crime sends a district attorney down a horrifying trail of madness and terror.

episodes.name: Tip 1960
episodes.overview: 19-year-old Katie Poirier was working the night shift at a convenience store when she was violently kidnapped. The abduction was captured on videotape but the images were not clear enough to identify her attacker.

episodes.name: Nine Days of Terror
episodes.overview: When a young college student disappears out of a mall parking lot, police find themselves in a race against time to find her before it is too late.

episodes.name: Lying in Wait
episodes.overview: A young mother goes out for a jog and runs into her killer. Does her teenage daughter hold the clue to solve the case?

episodes.name: A Fateful Decision
episodes.overview: A young mother is kidnapped out of her driveway after a birthday celebration… Did a string of good luck, lead to her disappearance?

episodes.name: A Thin Disguise
episodes.overview: A mysterious stranger ambushes a family as they pull into their driveway. Could the memories of a five year old girl be the key to solving the crime?

episodes.name: Ring of Truth
episodes.overview: When a young woman’s body is discovered high in the San Bernardino Mountains, detectives must figure out who she was and how she got there before they can catch the cold blooded killer who murdered her.

episodes.name: A Call for Justice
episodes.overview: After a man confesses to a terrible double homicide, police must determine whether he actually committed the crime.

episodes.name: Twisted Obsession
episodes.overview: When a beautiful young woman is found murdered out in the New Mexico wilderness, police must unravel her killer’s twisted obsession in order to solve the crime.

episodes.name: Stabbed in the Heart
episodes.overview: A beloved mother of four is stabbed to death in her bathroom. A mysterious V-shaped wound on her forehead finally leads police to her killer decades later.

episodes.name: This Is for Her
episodes.overview: A deadly home invasion leaves a father of three dead. Why was the victim’s wife, the only eyewitness to the crime left alive?

episodes.name: Deadly Predator
episodes.overview: A sexual predator viciously murders a 16-year-old girl. Can investigators catch him before he kills again?

episodes.name: Kidnapped on the 4th of July
episodes.overview: When a young woman’s pizza delivery car is found abandoned in the middle of the desolate stretch of road, a twenty three year mystery begins.

episodes.name: An Uninvited Guest
episodes.overview: A son discovers his mother’s violent murder and police must track down the killer who committed a deadly betrayal.

episodes.name: Trail of Carnage
episodes.overview: When 25-year-old Laci Hill vanishes without a trace; police receive the key to solving the mystery from her kidnapper’s wife.

episodes.name: Cry on My Shoulder
episodes.overview: When a young woman disappears, police zero in on her violent ex-boyfriend. But the secret to solving the case is buried in a cold case file.

episodes.name: Footprints and Whispers
episodes.overview: A beloved husband and wife are found dead in their own home. Will the killers own words bring him to justice?

episodes.name: Heartbreak in the Heartland
episodes.overview: A quiet Midwestern community is rocked by a gruesome triple homicide. The unspeakable tragedy robs one man of his mother, grandmother and 5-year-old son.

episodes.name: Evidence of Deception
episodes.overview: When a beautiful college coed is found dead in her dorm room police discover a crime scene where nothing is what it appears to be.

episodes.name: Fatal Turn
episodes.overview: A devoted mother vanishes on her way home from work. Her disappearance sends police into the darkest corners of the state and our justice system.

episodes.name: Footsteps in the Dark
episodes.overview: A beautiful young woman's is murdered in a dark parking lot. Did she know her killer or was she the victim of a deadly predator?

episodes.name: A Killer in Disguise
episodes.overview: Police race to track down the unlikely killer responsible for three terrifying murders.

episodes.name: She Wasn't Alone
episodes.overview: A beautiful young woman is viciously murdered just 24 hours after she was engaged to be married.

episodes.name: Almost Home
episodes.overview: A young woman's battered body is found on the side of the road. The shocking evidence from the crime leads police down a trail of tragedy.

episodes.name: The Long Path to Justice
episodes.overview: A couple’s daily walk ends in murder and a cloud of suspicion descends on the victim's family.

episodes.name: Snake in the Grass
episodes.overview: A cloud of smoke leads two truckers to a shocking discovery; the smoldering remains of a teenage girl.

episodes.name: For Love and Duty
episodes.overview: After Peter Caltury discovers the body of his 23-year-old daughter, Janet Walsh, murdered in her bed, a dedicated investigator spends more than 30 years pursuing her killer.

episodes.name: Solemn Vows
episodes.overview: When Mary Ringer returns to her family-owned wedding chapel, she finds her daughter, Deborah McCormick, lying on the floor covered in blood.

episodes.name: Trail of Tears
episodes.overview: While performing work on a Missouri farm, two brothers stumble upon the partially clothed body of 21-year-old Judy Spencer.

episodes.name: A Murder in Pelham
episodes.overview: A daughter spends 25 years pursuing the truth behind her mother’s mysterious murder.

episodes.name: A Father's Quest
episodes.overview: A father launches a relentless hunt for the killer of his 19-year-old daughter after finding her beaten and strangled to death.

episodes.name: Pattern of Violence
episodes.overview: A 22-year-old real estate agent is discovered strangled to death inside a model home she was trying to sell.

episodes.name: Field of Nightmares
episodes.overview: A young mother and son are found shot to death in a quiet Texas field. Would a mysterious bag left at the crime scene hold the key to catching their killer?

episodes.name: Path of Destruction
episodes.overview: When a 14-year-old girl is murdered, detectives must solve several terrifying crimes before they can bring her killer to justice.

episodes.name: A Drop of Blood
episodes.overview: A single mother is murdered at work. Will a single drop of blood lead police to her killer?

episodes.name: The Green Dragon
episodes.overview: A four year old boy’s terrifying discovery sends police on the hunt for a vicious killer.

episodes.name: Murder in Room 205
episodes.overview: A young woman’s journey to a new life comes to a savage end in a roadside motel.

episodes.name: Betrayal and Regret
episodes.overview: After a teenage girl is found murdered in an isolated cemetery, police must untangle a dark mystery in order to bring her killer to justice.

episodes.name: A Ray of Darkness
episodes.overview: Police must connect two vicious murders in order to bring a single killer to justice.

episodes.name: Unmistakable Truth
episodes.overview: A family of three is murdered and investigators must take on one of their own in order to find justice.

episodes.name: Trapped by Lies
episodes.overview: Before police can catch a depraved killer of a 15-year-old girl, they must first unravel a puzzling series of lies.

episodes.name: In Plain Sight
episodes.overview: Steve Kendall arrives home to find his wife, Kimberly, sexually assaulted, strangled and stabbed to death in their bedroom. Detectives process the scene and come to the realization that it points to a killer who is hiding in plain sight.

episodes.name: Hidden by Fire
episodes.overview: Firefighters respond to a house fire and discover the blaze is a cover-up for 16-year-old Beth Bosworth's savage murder. Will the charred remains of the house provide clues needed to solve this mysterious homicide?

episodes.name: A Nightmare in Memphis
episodes.overview: In Memphis, TN, young mother Deborah Grose tells police that she had a terrifying encounter with a stalker outside her work. Before police have a chance to investigate, her husband calls the next morning saying she never made it to work. Her mysterious disappearance launches one of the city's most notorious criminal investigations.

episodes.name: Deadly Warning
episodes.overview: A 15-year-old girl vanishes in the middle of the night. Would a friend's terrifying secret be the key to solving the mystery?

episodes.name: Where Evil Lives
episodes.overview: A 25-year-old aspiring model vanishes and the only clue police have is her empty car found in a nearby cemetery parking lot.

episodes.name: Blurred Truth
episodes.overview: A mother of five is found murdered in her bedroom. Will a grainy videotape reveal the identity of her killer?

episodes.name: Blood Money
episodes.overview: A blood-stained dollar bill is the first clue in a terrifying murder investigation. The frightening story of two college students may unravel the mystery behind Bradley Perry's murder.

episodes.name: A Window to Murder
episodes.overview: A teenager's valiant dying act helps police solve the terrifying mystery behind her murder.

episodes.name: A Terrible Secret
episodes.overview: A 13-year-old girl is found strangled to death on a river bank. The bed sheet she was wrapped in may be the key to solving the crime.

episodes.name: Last Call
episodes.overview: When Anita Andrews is savagely murdered inside her family's bar, police conclude that her killer was last patron she served that night.

episodes.name: A Mystery on Cherry Hill
episodes.overview: A beautiful young woman vanishes without a clue. Can police solve the mystery or will it take another terrible tragedy to reveal the truth?

episodes.name: Fatal Errand
episodes.overview: A young woman runs out to buy salad dressing and never returns. Can police provide her fiancé and family with answers to a tragic mystery?

episodes.name: Scent of a Killer
episodes.overview: As the investigation into Sandra Iverson's savage murder appears to be going cold, a police canine team uncovers the trail of the unlikely killer.

episodes.name: Evil Repeats Itself
episodes.overview: A beautiful teenager is found murdered in a desolate farmhouse while the home's owner is out of town.

episodes.name: Screams for Justice
episodes.overview: A young woman's desperate cries for help alert several neighbors to her fatal attack. But will their eyewitness accounts help catch her killer or send investigators down a road to disaster?

episodes.name: A Harvest of Grief
episodes.overview: A trail of blood and broken cornstalks leads police to the body of a beautiful young girl.

episodes.name: Eyes of a Killer
episodes.overview: A 19-year-old clerk is abducted from a Del Ray Beach convenience store while eyewitnesses watch in horror.

episodes.name: Shortcut to Murder
episodes.overview: A 14-year-old girl's shortcut home from school puts her on the path of a savage killer.

episodes.name: A Wave Goodbye
episodes.overview: A 14-year-old girl is found stabbed to death in an empty campground more than 50 miles away from where she was last seen.

episodes.name: Hidden by Lies
episodes.overview: A college student is found stabbed to death in her off campus apartment. Will it take a second tragic murder to solve her case?

episodes.name: A Killer in Town
episodes.overview: Police must track down a vicious killer on his deadly cross-country killing spree.

episodes.name: Desperate Cry
episodes.overview: A mother's desperate cry for help leads to a terrifying discovery.

episodes.name: A Killer in the Sun
episodes.overview: When Kenny Baker returns home, the backdoor is ajar and his wife, Kathy, and two-year-old son, Ryan, are nowhere to be found, having disappeared out of their backyard in broad daylight.

episodes.name: Shattered Hope
episodes.overview: 19-year-old Shelley Sikes vanishes one night after her shift, and then her abandoned, blood-streaked car is discovered on a dark roadway.

episodes.name: A Hole in Their Hearts
episodes.overview: A mother of three disappears from her office in broad daylight, and the case remains open for eight years until two farmers unearth a clue.

episodes.name: Golden Promises Broken
episodes.overview: High school sweethearts disappear during a picnic and investigators spend years chasing false leads.

episodes.name: Darkness After Dawn
episodes.overview: After a newlywed is found murdered in her bedroom, a search is launched for the killer that will last for three decades.

episodes.name: Same Crime Next Year
episodes.overview: A teenager is found murdered on the weekend of the Daytona 500 motor race in Daytona Beach, Florida. Then, one year later, police are called to the scene of a nearly identical crime.

episodes.name: River of Sadness
episodes.overview: A heartbreaking mystery begins with the discovery of a young woman's body floating in Washington state's Yakima River.

episodes.name: Crossed by Evil
episodes.overview: Police race to find a young woman who disappeared on her way to work, but the clues they discover reveal a trail of unspeakable evil.

episodes.name: Deadly Silence
episodes.overview: An 18-year-old woman never returns home after a night out with friends, and the police come up against a wall of silence that keeps them from uncovering the truth.

episodes.name: The Pastor's Wife
episodes.overview: Two small boys witness the brutal murder of their mother, and their story may bring her cold-blooded killer to justice 30 years later.

episodes.name: Deep Wounds
episodes.overview: After Navy electrician Michael Jacobs comes home to find his wife, Suzanne, and his 3-year-old son, Colin, murdered, San Diego police race to catch a serial killer who leaves behind an unimaginable calling card.

episodes.name: Gone in an Instant
episodes.overview: In Lenexa, Kansas, young women disappear from their apartments as police piece together evidence showing the terrifying crimes are connected.

episodes.name: Betrayal in Big Cottonwood Canyon
episodes.overview: A young woman is ambushed and murdered in Utah's remote Big Cottonwood Canyon. A cryptic note leaves investigators wondering if her death was just a tragic coincidence or a brutal betrayal.

episodes.name: Tracks of a Killer
episodes.overview: When the body of a young woman if discovered on a cold winter afternoon in South Carolina, police retrace her final movements to find the killer.

episodes.name: Racing to Justice
episodes.overview: Police race to find a killer after the decapitated body of a talented chef is found near Speedway, Indiana.

episodes.name: Last Dance
episodes.overview: A woman's walk home from a Friday night out at a dance club in Lubbock, TX, ends in murder. Her naked body is discovered under a bush right next to a church on Sunday morning. As the investigation unfolds, detectives realize the path to justice relies on following the evidence to an unlikely suspect.

episodes.name: A Promise Kept
episodes.overview: A cold case detective re-opens a decades old murder and promises the young woman's family their long awaited justice.

episodes.name: Deadly Offer
episodes.overview: An offer of help turns deadly when a young woman and her boyfriend find themselves stranded. Investigators are soon on the trail of a ruthless serial killer.

episodes.name: Mixed Signals
episodes.overview: After the lifeless body of a popular teen girl is found lying on the side of the road, police look to her cell phone records to catch her killer.

episodes.name: Courage and Conviction
episodes.overview: A college student's courageous battle for survival may be the key to solving a vicious double homicide.

episodes.name: Half Way Home
episodes.overview: The discovery of a woman's brutally beaten body inside an abandoned trailer is the start of a 28-year search for her killer.

episodes.name: The Doorbell Rang
episodes.overview: On January 11, 1988, 16-year-old Theresa Burns' brutally murdered body was found by her brother, Stephen, in their home in Mishawaka, IN. The ring of a doorbell overheard during Theresa's final phone call may be the key to solving her murder.

episodes.name: 22 Hours of Terror
episodes.overview: A 12-year-old girl is kidnapped, following a brutal home invasion... Can police find her and her abductor before its too late?

episodes.name: Broken Trust
episodes.overview: When an 8-year-old girl vanishes on the way home from school, her family and police are sent on a tormenting search for answers. [also marked as S13:E14]

episodes.name: Deceiving Appearances
episodes.overview: Two women are found stabbed to death three days before Christmas. A third person, a male coworker, is wounded and claims an intruder attacked them. As investigators study the evidence, it looks like the crime scene was staged.

episodes.name: The Answer Was No
episodes.overview: Police try to retrace a young mother's last known movements in a desperate attempt to solve her mysterious disappearance.

episodes.name: A Nightmare in Laurel
episodes.overview: When a young woman mysteriously disappears before her final shift at a Maryland hospital, her family begins a decades long search for answers.

episodes.name: Followed Home
episodes.overview: A loving mother of three is found mysteriously shot to death just steps from her home. There are few clues at the crime scene beyond a single bullet fragment and two unknown fingerprints. Will they be enough to find the killer?

episodes.name: Path of Tears
episodes.overview: A 14-year-old girl is killed while walking her dog. When law enforcement analyzes her cell phone, it reveals a series of shocking and heartbreaking clues that ultimately lead investigators straight to her killer.

episodes.name: Predator on the Loose
episodes.overview: Police believe there may be a dangerous predator loose on the streets of Stockton, California, and with each attack it appears the perpetrator is growing more violent.

episodes.name: Blood and Betrayal
episodes.overview: The discovery of a beautiful military police officer murdered in her own home sends police on a twisted journey for answers.

episodes.name: A Killer Among Friends
episodes.overview: When a teenager is found viciously murdered, police must retrace her last steps alive to identify her killer.

episodes.name: From Dusk to Darkness
episodes.overview: An Illinois family suffers a gut-wrenching journey through the justice system after their 10-year-old daughter is found savagely murdered.

episodes.name: Deadly Paper Trail
episodes.overview: A woman suddenly disappears in Minnesota. Her husband claims she was involved with another man, and his theory is backed up by over 250 intimate emails. Investigators question if her online love affair turned deadly. Will a trail of emails lead police to a vicious killer?

episodes.name: Dreams and Nightmares
episodes.overview: A teenage girl is found murdered the night before her college dream is about to begin. The case remains a mystery until another beautiful teen is found dead a few miles away. The investigation leads police to a sadistic predator.

episodes.name: Blood, Sweat and Tears
episodes.overview: A cool case team reopens the investigation into the murder of 36-year-old mother Linda Robinson who was savagely murdered while her 7-year-old niece is asleep in the next room.

episodes.name: Unfinished Journey
episodes.overview: A young woman about to start a Hollywood career mysteriously disappears off Interstate 10.

episodes.name: Identical Evidence
episodes.overview: A young woman is found murdered in a busy mall parking lot. Despite a treasure trove of evidence, detectives reach a crossroads in the investigation that could make solving the case a challenge they never imagined.

episodes.name: Mystery, Heartbreak and Justice
episodes.overview: Many stories don't end when the jury delivers its verdict. Three amazing cases where the quest for justice rages on.

episodes.name: A Betrayal Concealed
episodes.overview: A teenage girl's abduction and murder leaves a small Kentucky town reeling. The investigation and its resolution shatters the close-knit community and ultimately destroys a loving family.

episodes.name: A Hidden Clue
episodes.overview: A hidden clue could be the key to solving the vicious murder of a Massachusetts woman. [also marked as S14:E15]

episodes.name: A Face with No Name
episodes.overview: Police struggle to find a vicious killer despite having DNA evidence and a videotape of the suspect.

episodes.name: Deadly Deception
episodes.overview: After a father of four is gunned down, police investigate, discovering that nothing about the crime is what it appears to be.

episodes.name: Darkness in the Desert
episodes.overview: A Las Vegas man claims his wife mysteriously vanished during a visit to a local spy store. Police question the odd story until they make a shocking discovery in a desolate and windblown stretch of the desert.

episodes.name: The East Area Rapist
episodes.overview: Will law enforcement ever catch a sexual sadist whose crimes have tormented the state of California for decades?

episodes.name: Haunting Memories
episodes.overview: When a college student goes missing from a mall parking lot, police are convinced foul play is behind her disappearance.

episodes.name: Murder in Store
episodes.overview: A young woman is murdered inside the video game store she managed by a mysterious intruder.

episodes.name: A Stranger Among Us
episodes.overview: When a teenager vanishes during a visit to her hometown, it becomes the beginning of a terrifying 30-year mystery.

episodes.name: Greed, Lies and Murder
episodes.overview: A mother of three disappears from the home of her wealthy older boyfriend. Investigators question if jealousy is the motive behind the mystery.

episodes.name: Deadly Riddle
episodes.overview: A young girl’s killer sends police a series of mysterious riddles and the key to catching him are hidden within the answers.

episodes.name: Trail of Betrayal
episodes.overview: When a newlywed couple mysteriously disappears, police must piece together a shocking trail of betrayal.

episodes.name: A Deadly Omen
episodes.overview: A teenager vanishes from a movie theater parking lot. Forty years later, police from all over the state of California piece together the clues to find her killer.

episodes.name: Unanswered Questions
episodes.overview: Patti Berry disappears on the way to pick up her child at the babysitter’s, then her body is found in a secluded wooded area not far from her abandoned blood-soaked car.

episodes.name: Sirens in the Night
episodes.overview: The body of a young woman is found in the ashes of a fire. As detectives begin retracing her last-known movements, a suspect comes into focus. But can they connect him to the evidence and bring a killer to justice?

episodes.name: River of Tears
episodes.overview: A young woman's lifeless body is found on the bank of a shallow river, and there's a note in her pocket that may point to her killer.

episodes.name: A Nightmare in Idaho Falls
episodes.overview: A brutal double homicide shatters two Idaho families. The murders appear to ritualistic, but remarkable police work and insight from loved ones reveals the stunning truth.

episodes.name: Stolen Dreams
episodes.overview: A young woman is found savagely murdered in her new home. Will the trail of clues police discovered lead them to her killer?

episodes.name: Twisted Lies
episodes.overview: In Las Vegas, a few teens on their way to school come across an abandoned car with a 41-year-old mother of four handcuffed and murdered in the passenger seat. Investigators have a solid theory of the crime but no suspects until a records clerk in the insurance fraud unit blows the case wide open.

episodes.name: Deadly Hymn
episodes.overview: The murder of a beloved and talented church organist sends police on a disturbing search for answers.

episodes.name: That's Him!
episodes.overview: A successful car salesman is killed in a hail of gunfire on his front porch. Investigators follow a trail of money that leads them to the mastermind behind the murder.

episodes.name: Stacy's Story
episodes.overview: A mother finds her teenage daughter savagely murdered inside their own home. A few drops of blood discovered decades later could be the key to solving the tragic mystery.

episodes.name: A Murder in Coralville
episodes.overview: A young woman is found shot to death near a dirt road; police hope the bullet found at the scene will unmask her killer.

episodes.name: A Predator in Deerfield
episodes.overview: When a young woman and her 6-month-old child disappear off the quiet streets of Deerfield Beach, FL, it is the beginning of a terrifying murder mystery.

episodes.name: In the Blink of an Eye
episodes.overview: A convenience store worker is abducted from behind the counter in the middle of the night, becoming the first of three women to disappear from their small town under shockingly similar circumstances.

episodes.name: In the Shadows of Home
episodes.overview: The body of a teenager is found savagely murdered just steps from her home; when the investigation stalls, police are approached by a brave young woman who is willing to risk her own safety to get justice.

episodes.name: Scattered Clues, Shattered Lives
episodes.overview: A wave of fear sweeps across Aurora, CO, after two similar crimes are committed just days apart, and police race to stop a hammer-wielding killer before he strikes again.

episodes.name: As She Lay Dying
episodes.overview: A young mother is viciously stabbed in broad daylight, and her final words may provide police with the key to catching her killer.

episodes.name: River of Sorrow
episodes.overview: A beautiful young woman is savagely murdered while fishing along the Platte River.

episodes.name: A Lifetime of Questions
episodes.overview: As a 4-year-old girl, Heidi Jones discovered her mother's lifeless body on the living room floor; now, as an adult, Jones guides police on a relentless quest to find her mother's killer.

episodes.name: Last Night Before Murder
episodes.overview: A young mother inexplicably disappears in the middle of the night only to be found savagely murdered the next morning, prompting police to retrace the tumultuous events of her last night on Earth.

episodes.name: A Daughter's Quest
episodes.overview: A young woman's search for her birth mother ultimately leads her on a quest for justice.

episodes.name: Notes From a Killer
episodes.overview: When a young girl disappears from a quiet suburban street, it marks the beginning of a terrifying game of cat and mouse between police and her abductor.

episodes.name: Long Sought Truth
episodes.overview: It takes decades for investigators to follow the evidence to the long-sought-after truth behind the terrifying abduction and murder of 20-year-old Leslie Long, a young mother of three.

episodes.name: A Different Time
episodes.overview: After leaving home with a baseball mitt on a sunny afternoon, 14-year-old Barbara Rowan disappears, never to be seen alive again. A neighbor informs the police that she left to speak with her coach, even though she wasn't signed up for a team.

episodes.name: Wheres Crystal ID
episodes.overview: After a young mother goes missing during a Fourth of July weekend, it marks the beginning of a disturbing mystery, one that will devastate a loving family and tear a small community apart.

episodes.name: Terror in Waupaca
episodes.overview: A young girl's mother reported that her daughter had disappeared while playing outside her mother-in-law's home. Investigators immediately descended on the community, searching cornfields and creeks in the area hoping for clues.

episodes.name: Taken From Her Bed
episodes.overview: A mother discovers that her young 8-year-old daughter has been abducted from her bedroom in the middle of the night.

episodes.name: A Bridge Too Far
episodes.overview: Just hours after a popular teenager is reported missing, her lifeless body is discovered under a nearby bridge; police must sort through her puzzling last hours alive to bring a ruthless killer to justice.

episodes.name: Shifting Stories
episodes.overview: After a beautiful young woman vanishes, investigators must sort through a series of puzzling clues to solve a deadly mystery.

episodes.name: Terrifying Clues
episodes.overview: A young woman's late-night call from a pay phone is transformed into the scene of a terrifying abduction.

episodes.name: Buried Dreams
episodes.overview: A woman relentlessly investigates her daughter's disappearance leading police to a terrifying string of murders.

episodes.name: In the Dead of Night
episodes.overview: Police must retrace a teenager's last known movements if they hope to find out when and where she crossed paths with her killer.

episodes.name: Lethal Offer
episodes.overview: While a predator leaves a trail of destruction in his wake, it may fall to a teenage girl to bring an end to his reign of terror.

episodes.name: The Depths of Evil
episodes.overview: While searching for a missing mother, police discover evidence that puts them on the trail of a deadly sexual predator.

episodes.name: Unchecked Violence
episodes.overview: When a senior at Ohio State University goes missing, it marks the beginning of a terrifying murder mystery.

episodes.name: No Goodbyes
episodes.overview: A mother arrives home to have lunch with her teenage daughter and walks into a nightmare she will never forget.

episodes.name: History Repeats Itself
episodes.overview: After a young mother vanishes, her trail goes cold, then a shocking discovery reveals that history repeats itself.

episodes.name: A Face and a Voice
episodes.overview: When a young teacher is murdered in her home, police must rely on the eyewitness testimony of a young neighbor who saw her killer lurking outside her window.

episodes.name: Alone With Evil
episodes.overview: A young mother is strangled to death during her overnight shift at an office building.

episodes.name: Blood Secrets
episodes.overview: A beloved grandmother is savagely murdered during a life-and-death struggle; a family secret may be the key to bringing her heartless killer to justice.

episodes.name: A Hero Betrayed
episodes.overview: When a hero firefighter is found savagely murdered in his own home, the trail of evidence police find takes them on a twisting and tension filled journey to justice.

episodes.name: She's Gone
episodes.overview: When a young girl kidnapped from her bed in the middle of the night is found dead in a nearby canal, it marks the beginning of one of Salt Lake City's most notorious child murder investigations.

episodes.name: While Her Children Slept
episodes.overview: After a four-year-old girl finds her mother's lifeless body, police must try to unravel a puzzling mystery. A murder investigation in which they must rule out multiple solid suspects before they arrive at the unlikely killer.

episodes.name: Rumors, Lies and Murder
episodes.overview: After two sisters are found murdered, police find evidence painting a grim picture of the heartbreaking double homicide.

episodes.name: Good Morning, Goodnight and Goodbye
episodes.overview: When a 16-year-old girl disappears on her way to visit friends, the police retrace her last known movements and uncover a terrifying possibility that she may have been kidnapped by an international human trafficking ring.

episodes.name: Smoke and Lies
episodes.overview: Police investigate a residential house fire and discover it was intentionally set to cover-up a savage murder. Had the killer managed to destroy all the evidence or was there a clue he overlooked?

episodes.name: A Handful Of Coins
episodes.overview: When a loving mother is found gunned down just steps from her front door, police in her small town are baffled; as the investigation unfolds their initial confusion will quickly boil over into outrage.

episodes.name: Before Her Eyes
episodes.overview: A teenage couple out on a date are ambushed by a gun-wielding madman; the lone survivor's heartbreaking account may hold the key to bringing a cold-blooded killer to justice.

episodes.name: Never the Same
episodes.overview: A woman and her teenage daughter are savagely murdered in their own home; police find clues at the crime scene, including a bloody bare footprint and an unharmed 3-year-old girl with a heartbreaking story.

episodes.name: The Truth Never Dies
episodes.overview: When a young woman is found shot to death in her home, police are baffled; then a cryptic letter from a mysterious source sends the investigation down a twisting road to the truth.

episodes.name: Cloud of Darkness
episodes.overview: A college student disappears in broad daylight after an afternoon of sunbathing at a busy lake; the mystery deepens when her wallet is found along with personal items belonging to another victim of a violent crime.

episodes.name: Rocky Mountain Mystery
episodes.overview: When a young woman disappears on a cold night in Breckenridge Colo., one of the state's darkest mysteries begins.

episodes.name: Nowhere to Run
episodes.overview: Two girls take a trip to the mall and never come home; less than 24 hours later they are found shot to death in a desolate field; investigators ask whether they were killed by someone they knew or a notorious serial killer.

episodes.name: Capitol Murder
episodes.overview: Investigators look into the case of an elected community official who is found stabbed to death at his own home in Washington DC.

episodes.name: Connected by Murder
episodes.overview: After years of frustration and heartbreak, investigators from three states work together to find the deadly predator responsible for three murders that are connected by one common thread.

episodes.name: A Life Halted
episodes.overview: When a young woman is savagely murdered in her own home, police must study the bloody crime scene to find the clue that will lead them to her killer.

episodes.name: Driven To Murder
episodes.overview: When police find a beautiful young woman run over by her own car it marks the beginning of a terrifying murder mystery.

episodes.name: In Defiance Of Evil
episodes.overview: A teenager vanishes during a bike ride through Point Defiance Park. The investigation into her disappearance leads police to fear that a serial killer is on the loose in Tacoma.

episodes.name: The Disappearance Of Sarah Stern
episodes.overview: When a young woman's car is found abandoned on a bridge, police must consider three possibilities. Had she run away, committed suicide, or been the victim of foul play?

episodes.name: Twisted Justice
episodes.overview: An unlikely pair of investigators strive to solve Elaine Fogle's murder after the case goes cold for four decades.

episodes.name: A Dream Shattered
episodes.overview: A young schoolteacher is savagely murdered in the doorway of her own home.

episodes.name: Classified Murder
episodes.overview: Police uncover a trail of terrifying clues while investigating a couple’s disappearance; they come to suspect that the couple has fallen victim to a carefully laid trap in the classified pages of the newspaper.

episodes.name: A Mystery In Indio
episodes.overview: As investigators study the chilling crime scene inside Wendi Brant's horse ranch, one thing seems clear, the 45-year-old had been brutally killed by someone she knew and trusted.

episodes.name: A Secret To Kill For
episodes.overview: When an Air Force Major is found beaten to death just outside his home police wonder, was it a random act of violence or was his top-secret job at a nearby military base the motive for his murder?

episodes.name: Officer Down
episodes.overview: A beloved detective is killed during a shoot out in at a downtown Atlanta hotel. Can his fellow officers, including his own son, bring the two shooters to justice?

episodes.name: Seven Minutes Of Terror
episodes.overview: After Michael Brinkman is murdered in his home, police are left to untangle the mystery of why the two masked home invaders stole nothing and left a series of strange clues at the crime scene.

episodes.name: Betrayal In The Mountains
episodes.overview: The discovery of the body of a young woman in the tree line of a popular camp site in the Rocky Mountains marks the beginning of a terrifying murder mystery.

episodes.name: Terrifying Calls
episodes.overview: A young girl disappears on her way home from school and the only clue police have is a series of terrifying calls her family had received in the days before she went missing.

episodes.name: One Of Their Own
episodes.overview: When the daughter of an FBI agent disappears from an airport parking lot, law enforcement from all over the country rally to find one of their own. But the case quickly becomes one of the bureau's most difficult and heartbreaking investigations.

episodes.name: The Hero Who Wasn't
episodes.overview: When a couple enters their home during a robbery in progress, a deadly shoot out erupts, leaving two people dead. But when police begin an investigation they discover clues that it may not have been what it appears to be.

episodes.name: No Body Two Crimes
episodes.overview: When a popular woman disappears from her home, police work tirelessly to uncover the route of her last known movements. Would a trail of videotape lead them to her killer?

episodes.name: Shadow Of Suspicion
episodes.overview: A young woman travels to California in pursuit of a Hollywood dream and winds up the victim of a savage homicide.

episodes.name: One Of Us
episodes.overview: A young records clerk at the Seattle police department is murdered on her way to work her overnight shift. Can police find the evidence to catch the killer of one of their own?

episodes.name: Salt In The Wound
episodes.overview: An independent young woman starting out in life on her own, becomes the victim of a bizarre and vicious homicide in her apartment.

episodes.name: Wedding Day Nightmare
episodes.overview: A young woman getting ready to be a bridesmaid at her best friend's wedding is found viciously stabbed to death in her own home.

episodes.name: Little Lamb
episodes.overview: Investigators must identify a gunman who murdered a young mother but spared her child asleep in her car seat in the back of her minivan.

episodes.name: Terror in Bedford Park
episodes.overview: A young woman is found stabbed to death locked inside a locker at a storage facility.

episodes.name: Evidence Never Lies
episodes.overview: A young woman is found drowned in her bathtub and the evidence at the crime scene indicates her killer was someone she knew and trusted.

episodes.name: Long Walk, Cold Night
episodes.overview: When a teenage girl is found murdered after a night out with friend, Police must retrace her final steps to find her killer.

episodes.name: Texts Lies and Videotape
episodes.overview: When a young mother disappears, a series of text messages from her phone lead police to believe she left on her own. Then, her family uncovers evidence that she may have actually been the victim of foul play.

episodes.name: A Predator in the Woods
episodes.overview: Two young girls are lured into a deadly trap by a vicious sexual predator. Can the lone survivor of the attack help police bring her best friend's killer to justice?

episodes.name: In the Wind
episodes.overview: A daughter's quest to see her birth mother's murder solved is complicated when police discover the prime suspect is in the wind.

episodes.name: Lying in the Darkness
episodes.overview: A jeep swerves off a dark stretch of road and takes the life of a loving mother. But when law enforcement arrives, they discover evidence that the accident wasn't the cause of her death.

episodes.name: Spreadsheet Of Terror
episodes.overview: When the body of a teenage girl is found in the Columbia River, police wonder if she was the victim of an accident or suicide. But the evidence reveals it was the beginning of disturbing murder mystery.

episodes.name: A Test Of Patience
episodes.overview: The unsolved murder of a teenager torments a small, midwestern city for decades until a relentless team of investigators finally finds the clue that breaks the case wide open.

episodes.name: A Heartbreaking Discovery
episodes.overview: When a young mother disappears police painstakingly retrace her last known movements. The trail of clues they uncover leads to a shocking and heartbreaking discovery.

episodes.name: Crime And Injustice
episodes.overview: In February 1976, 19-year-old Michelle Mitchell vanished from a well-lit parking lot in Reno, NV; the young woman's disappearance would quickly be at the center of one of the most complex and disturbing cases in the state's history.

episodes.name: A Murder In Thunderbolt
episodes.overview: When a couple is found shot down in front of their home in the suburb of Thunderbolt, the entire community hears the barrage of gunfire. As police sift through the evidence they must determine if one of the neighbours is a witness or the killer.

episodes.name: A Jewel Stolen
episodes.overview: After a young mother is found murdered in her own home, investigators must untangle a web of lies using wiretaps and secret recordings to ultimately pick up the trail of her cold-blooded killer.

episodes.name: When, Where, and Who?
episodes.overview: When a 15-year-old girl vanishes from her front porch, police must uncover when she was last seen, where she might have been going, and who would have wanted her dead.

episodes.name: Follow the Footprints
episodes.overview: When the lifeless body of a young girl is found on the shore of the Feather River, police hope that following a trail of footsteps and discarded articles of clothing will lead them to her killer.

episodes.name: Christina's Story
episodes.overview: When a young girl vanishes while walking her dog on a military base, it marks the beginning of a missing persons case that would capture the hearts of the entire county.

episodes.name: A Brand New Dress
episodes.overview: An argument among sisters over a new dress leads a young girl to leave her house to calm down. But when she never returns, the desperate search to find her begins.

episodes.name: Gone in Less Than 3 Minutes
episodes.overview: A teenage lifeguard vanishes from a quiet community swimming hole less than three minutes after her mother dropped her off for work.

episodes.name: A Storm of Rage
episodes.overview: A beautiful young mother vanishes just hours before the deadliest hurricane in Texas history; the investigation forces her loved ones to weather a storm and then survive a tempest.

episodes.name: A Wolf in Sheep's Clothing
episodes.overview: A compassionate and outgoing woman's dream vacation turns into a deadly nightmare when she crosses paths with a wolf in sheep's clothing.

episodes.name: A Complicated Relationship
episodes.overview: A beloved mother of four disappears just days after her stepdaughter vanished; police investigate their complicated relationship.

episodes.name: A Blue Raincoat
episodes.overview: After a young girl disappears on her way home from school, police find her blue raincoat thirty miles away. It marks the start of a heartbreaking homicide investigation.

episodes.name: It Won't End Well
episodes.overview: A young woman's strange encounter with a man outside her home becomes the thread that unravels a terrifying murder mystery.

episodes.name: Clearing the Docket
episodes.overview: A teenager vanishes during a walk to the store on a cold winter night; the next morning police find her lifeless body in a snowbank six miles away.

episodes.name: Follow That Car
episodes.overview: When a loving father is found murdered execution-style in his own home, investigators must follow the trail of his missing car to find his cold-blooded killer.

episodes.name: Cali-Doe
episodes.overview: A young girl is murdered in Caledonia, NY, and police struggle to identify her. The tragedy leads the town make her one of their own, with the name Cali-Doe.

episodes.name: Evidence Lost, Justice Found
episodes.overview: A young woman riding her bicycle is forced off the road and savagely murdered. Police chase her killer for decades until an overlooked clue ultimately leads to justice.

episodes.name: Devil in a Cowboy Hat
episodes.overview: A young woman is found bound and strangled to death on the side of a road. As police retrace her final steps, they discover she was last seen being followed by a suspicious man in a cowboy hat.

episodes.name: Trail of a Monster
episodes.overview: The murder of a respected health care aide sends a chill through her community. When the investigation reveals several shockingly similar crimes, police realize they've uncovered the trail of a monster.

episodes.name: Circled by Vultures
episodes.overview: A tourist takes a photo of vultures in Joshua Tree National Park and inadvertently discovers a gruesome homicide.

episodes.name: Terrifying Connections
episodes.overview: When a 15-year-old boy vanished under mysterious circumstances police feared the worst. It appeared the case had terrifying connections to a serial killer who had left a trail of bloodshed across the region.

episodes.name: What Happened to Sarah?
episodes.overview: A 14-year-old girl's mysterious runaway note raises difficult questions for police. Had she really left home on her own or had someone close to her pieced together writing from her journals to cover-up an unthinkable crime.

episodes.name: Terror in Terre Haute
episodes.overview: When a young college student is abducted from her campus parking lot it marks the beginning of a terrifying crime wave on a quiet college campus. Can police catch a serial predator before he strikes again?

episodes.name: Justice for Angie
episodes.overview: After a young girl disappears from her bus stop, a nine-day search reveals that her terrifying abduction has ended in a heartbreaking homicide. As police mount a tireless search to find her killer, the community rallies together to get justice for Angie.

episodes.name: The Smallest of Clues
episodes.overview: A burned out car and a blood-stained bedroom reveal the chilling murder of a community pillar. Will it be the smallest of clues that lead police to her heartless killer?

episodes.name: No Escape
episodes.overview: A young woman’s disappearance marks the beginning of a heartbreaking murder mystery. Will a clue discovered by a child be the key to catching his mother’s killer?

episodes.name: Web of Torment
episodes.overview: The abduction of a young mother from a crowded hospital parking lot is the beginning of a terrifying mystery that will torment her loved ones for decades.

episodes.name: Unthinkable Harm
episodes.overview: When a teenager is found savagely stabbed to death in her home, police hope a trail of blood found at the crime scene will lead them to her killer.

episodes.name: Gone in a Blink
episodes.overview: A teenager waiting for her friends to give her a ride home from work suddenly disappears. When her friends arrive, they find terrifying evidence of her abduction.

episodes.name: Alarm and Betrayal
episodes.overview: Police must unravel a puzzling mystery when a beloved father and real estate executive is ambushed in his office.

episodes.name: A Cracked Alibi
episodes.overview: If investigators can’t find the crack in their suspect’s seemingly air-tight alibi, a cold-blooded killer will elude justice.

episodes.name: A Secret Meeting
episodes.overview: After a teenager mysteriously disappears, police must determine if a secret meeting with a young man led to her murder.

episodes.name: Precious Jane Doe
episodes.overview: After a young woman is viciously murdered, police launch a two-part investigation; one to find her killer and a second to identify his victim, “Precious” Jane Doe.

episodes.name: A Mother Knows
episodes.overview: A young female soldier is found slain after a night out in Colorado Springs, CO. The investigation into her torture, molestation and murder eventually goes cold. It takes decades and advances in DNA processing to finally land her killer and bring him to justice.

episodes.name: Hauntingly Familiar
episodes.overview: Hauntingly Familiar: Investigators must overturn a shocking decision before they can solve the hauntingly familiar murder of a teenager.

episodes.name: Capable of Murder
episodes.overview: Police investigate the gruesome murder of a mother and child, only to realize all the evidence indicates the killer was someone the victims knew and trusted.

episodes.name: Dark Clouds Lead to a Storm
episodes.overview: A beautiful young woman turns up savagely murdered in a bar parking lot; as investigators retrace her last known steps, several suspects with possible motives come on their radar.

episodes.name: FLRT 12
episodes.overview: Police wonder if a young woman's personalized license plate, FLRT 12, makes her the target for murder or if a far more sinister plot is behind the crime.

episodes.name: Blood Reveals the Sword
episodes.overview: Police find a giant sword bent in half, alongside a victim who has been savagely murdered. Investigators must sort through the details of his complicated life in order bring his killer to justice.

episodes.name: Hammer and Dust
episodes.overview: After a loving mother is murdered inside her own home, police focus on their two best clues -- a blood-stained hammer and a dusty footprint.

episodes.name: Dance to Doom
episodes.overview: Veteran journalist Paula Zahn steps out of the studio and into the field to unravel criminal investigations, tracking the drama of each story by featuring the opinions of those closest to the case.

episodes.name: Don't Open the Door
episodes.overview: An unidentified woman is found callously murdered in an off-campus apartment; police have no leads on the case until her terrified neighbour shares a chilling story.

episodes.name: Eyes in the Darkness
episodes.overview: The baffling murder of a young woman leads police to two potential suspects: her new boyfriend and an obsessed stalker.

episodes.name: Shadowy Figures
episodes.overview: The search for the man who murdered a single mother might lead police to the perpetrator of a second brutal crime with chilling similarities.

episodes.name: Where is Miya?
episodes.overview: A college student disappears, and her family launches a desperate investigation to find her; what they discover changes their lives forever.

episodes.name: The Smallest Clue
episodes.overview: A murdered teenager's body mysteriously turns up in the rural Iowa countryside. Will the smallest clue be the key to bringing her killer to justice?

episodes.name: A Spiderweb of Tragedy
episodes.overview: As police try to solve a disturbing homicide, each step of the investigation reveals another layer in a spiderweb of tragedy.

episodes.name: A Needle in the Mud
episodes.overview: A young mother vanishes, leaving behind nothing but puzzling clues and disturbing questions; a needle in the mud may reveal the truth behind her disappearance.

episodes.name: Lost Life, Evidence Found
episodes.overview: Paula Zahn talks to investigators, witnesses, victims' families and incarcerated criminals.

episodes.name: From Zero to Murder
episodes.overview: Police investigating the brutal murder of a young woman start to wonder if the ambush-style shooting that ended the victim's life resulted from a terrifying case of mistaken identity.

episodes.name: Jenny's Story
episodes.overview: A homicide on May 27, 1994, and its disturbing details devastate 14-year-old Jenny Lin's loving family, leaving the tight-knit community of Castro Valley, CA, to wonder if their loved one could become the next victim.

episodes.name: Graduation to Murder
episodes.overview: On the morning of June 7, 1995, in Atlanta, GA, 14-year-old Nacole Smith is taking a shortcut back home, through a path in the woods, to get a forgotten project for school. Her body is discovered brutally murdered in those woods later that morning and police race to catch her killer before he can destroy another loving family.

episodes.name: Mystery in Coachella Valley
episodes.overview: The gruesome murder of horse ranch owner Wendi Brant traumatises her friends and family; Police focus on her estranged husband, but there are other potential suspects that muddy the investigation and throw the case into a decades-long tailspin.

episodes.name: Room 106
episodes.overview: The chilling murder of Lee Rotatori and the bizarre crime scene evidence police found inside her motel room mark the beginning of a heartbreaking homicide investigation with multiple victims.

episodes.name: Changing Stories
