episodes.overview: When a young girl vanishes under mysterious circumstances, police must discover if she simply ran away or was actually the victim of something far more sinister.

episodes.name: The Year of fear
episodes.overview: The murder of a young college student in her off-campus apartment leads police to believe the killer may be someone she knew and the investigation into the crime threatens to tear her grieving family apart.

episodes.name: The Mother She Never Knew
episodes.overview: A teenage girl discovers her mother's true identity, along with a telegram that says she's been murdered; her crusade to bring a killer to justice may also bring her closer to the woman she never knew.

episodes.name: Unthinkable betrayal
episodes.overview: Police must solve the murder of a young mother who was savagely strangled to death in her bed while her two young sons slept just steps away; decades of investigating reveal an unthinkable betrayal of trust.

episodes.name: A Call for Answers
episodes.overview: After police find a young mother bound and murdered in her bedroom, her family challenges police to bring a heartless killer to justice.

episodes.name: A Bad Man Hurt Mommy
episodes.overview: Police try to make sense of the confusing crime scene and find the person who killed a young mother.

episodes.name: Blood-Stained Reputation
episodes.overview: Police must analyze a long emotional and rage-filled 911 call to see if it was made by a distraught husband or a killer trying to cover his tracks.

episodes.name: New Year's Eve Nightmare
episodes.overview: A woman finds a young mother murdered following a festive New Year's celebration; police trace her last known steps to find her killer.

episodes.name: Disconnected Story
episodes.overview: The police must identify the killer of a young mother based only on her frantic words in a disconnected 911 call.

episodes.name: Confessions and Lies
episodes.overview: The investigation of a brutal murder forces police to challenge both confessions and lies.

episodes.name: Pretty Pink Bicycle
episodes.overview: A young girl vanishes on a trip to the mailbox and her abandoned pink bicycle may be the key to solving the disturbing mystery.

episodes.name: Follow the Blood
episodes.overview: Blood spattered from a young woman's apartment balcony to the parking lot below could lead police to her coldly calculated murderer.

episodes.name: Faith and Duty
episodes.overview: A mysterious late-night call requesting last rites for a loved one leads to the shocking murder of a beloved priest.

episodes.name: Justice Frozen
episodes.overview: The police look to find the killer of an unidentified woman found bound, frozen and shot to death in the mountains of Utah.

episodes.name: A Lifetime Of Grief
episodes.overview: Painful questions torment a loving husband after his wife's brutal murder; in particular, the community's doubts about whether he had been her killer.

episodes.name: Voice for the Nameless
episodes.overview: Police must track down the vicious killer of two separate Jane Doe victims, murdered in a shockingly similar way.

episodes.name: Tragedy in Visalia
episodes.overview: The abduction of a young girl sends a detective on a quest to bring justice to her heartbroken family.

episodes.name: A Quest for Justice
episodes.overview: A young mother is murdered inside her home, and her family hopes to help put her killer behind bars.

episodes.name: Text, Lies and Video
episodes.overview: A daughter receives an odd text from her mother's phone claiming she left town with a new man, which is the first clue that something is very wrong. The ensuing investigation uncovers more troubling evidence proving her worst fears have come true...

episodes.name: Where is Jonelle?
episodes.overview: Someone abducts a 12-year-old girl returning home from her church choir recital, staying alone for less than one hour...

episodes.name: A Murder in Red Cliff
episodes.overview: Did a woman's crusade to teach children to read lead to her murder? Police ultimately realize their only hope of finding an answer is to follow the clues left behind by the victim...

episodes.name: Righting a Wrong
episodes.overview: A look at a witness account that could lead a small-town police department in the wrong direction as it tries to solve the murder of a friend...

episodes.name: Love Lost, Justice Found
episodes.overview: Will the chilling evidence found inside a quaint Utah bookstore bring the killer of its beloved owner to justice?

episodes.name: Wrong Place, Wrong Time
episodes.overview: Can police find the killer of two teenagers discovered inside a car?

episodes.name: Where He Belongs
episodes.overview: Police must connect the crime scene evidence from two eerily similar murders to put one vicious killer where he belongs: behind bars

episodes.name: Dissecting a Triangle
episodes.overview: Police struggle to dissect the love triangle that led to the disappearance of 21-year-old married college student and mother Bethany Decker in Ashburn, VA; her jilted husband, Emile, and her jealous new boyfriend, Ronald Roldan, are prime suspects.

episodes.name: An American Tragedy
episodes.overview: Can police solve the murder of a young woman killed while celebrating her graduation from U.S. Naval training?

episodes.name: When the Music's Over
episodes.overview: In 2014, police discover that Tiffany Pugh, the successful wife of a popular DJ, has been murdered in her home in East Point, GA; the array of video cameras in the neighborhood could help bring her killer to justice.

episodes.name: A Murder at Paradise Ranch
episodes.overview: Police use a revolutionary new technique to sort through a long list of guests and employees at the Paradise Ranch to find the one person responsible for a savage murder...

episodes.name: The Bitter Truth
episodes.overview: We don't have a summary for The Bitter Truth yet. Hang in there, or go ahead and contribute one.
